headline.main: Jury: Firefighter Fraudulently Collected Disability Pension
headline.print_headline: Jury: Firefighter Fraudulently Collected Disability Pension

docs.snippet: A former firefighter accused of collecting a state disability pension while working as a martial arts instructor and participating in competitive mixed martial arts has been convicted of theft by deception....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former firefighter accused of collecting a state disability pension while working as a martial arts instructor and participating in competitive mixed martial arts has been convicted of theft by deception.

headline.main: Analysis: Fed Eyes U.S. Rate Hike, but Second-Guesses Economic Gauges
headline.print_headline: Analysis: Fed Eyes U.S. Rate Hike, but Second-Guesses Economic Gauges

docs.snippet: Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen has declared that the U.S. central bank's interest-rate decisions will depend on how the economy performs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal Reserve Chair Janet Yellen has declared that the U.S. central bank's interest-rate decisions will depend on how the economy performs.

headline.main: Ready for the Record, Warriors Go After 73 Wins in Finale
headline.print_headline: Ready for the Record, Warriors Go After 73 Wins in Finale

docs.snippet: Stephen Curry never figured the Chicago Bulls' 72-win mark could be matched or eclipsed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry never figured the Chicago Bulls' 72-win mark could be matched or eclipsed.

headline.main: UN Official: More Help Needed for Africa's Sahel Region
headline.print_headline: UN Official: More Help Needed for Africa's Sahel Region

docs.snippet: A senior U.N. official on Tuesday said the ongoing poverty and horror resulting from attacks by the extremist Boko Haram group in Africa's Lake Chad basin are at their worst and called for increased relief funding for its 3 million people and broa...
docs.lead_paragraph: A senior U.N. official on Tuesday said the ongoing poverty and horror resulting from attacks by the extremist Boko Haram group in Africa's Lake Chad basin are at their worst and called for increased relief funding for its 3 million people and broader international engagement in the region.

headline.main: Oklahoma Prosecutors Allege Abuse Before Boy's Disappearance
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma Prosecutors Allege Abuse Before Boy's Disappearance

docs.snippet: An Oklahoma couple arrested in the 2006 disappearance of their 9-year-old nephew had beaten the boy until he lay motionless on a couch and then threatened the boy's brother into repeating a rehearsed story to authorities, prosecutors allege in an ...
docs.lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma couple arrested in the 2006 disappearance of their 9-year-old nephew had beaten the boy until he lay motionless on a couch and then threatened the boy's brother into repeating a rehearsed story to authorities, prosecutors allege in an affidavit filed Tuesday.

headline.main: Army Grants Sikh Enlistees Waiver to Its Beard Policy
headline.print_headline: Army Grants Sikh Enlistees Waiver to Its Beard Policy

docs.snippet: The Army has ruled that three Sikh enlistees will be allowed to serve while keeping their distinctive beards and turbans....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Army has ruled that three Sikh enlistees will be allowed to serve while keeping their distinctive beards and turbans.

headline.main: Bill Clinton Is Wrong About His Crime Bill. So Are the Protesters He Lectured.

docs.snippet: Debating the 1994 law is, by and large, empty symbolism — and a distraction from real reform....
docs.lead_paragraph: Debating the 1994 law is, by and large, empty symbolism — and a distraction from real reform.

headline.main: U.S. Banks Need More Information on How 'Living Wills' Are Judged: GAO
headline.print_headline: U.S. Banks Need More Information on How 'Living Wills' Are Judged: GAO

docs.snippet: Big banks do not have enough information on how U.S. regulators evaluate their plans to wind down operations during a crisis without the help of public money, known in the industry as a "living will," and are scrambling to meet annual deadlines fo...
docs.lead_paragraph: Big banks do not have enough information on how U.S. regulators evaluate their plans to wind down operations during a crisis without the help of public money, known in the industry as a "living will," and are scrambling to meet annual deadlines for filing them, according to the Government Accountability Office.

headline.main: Small Consolation for Spieth: He Still Has a Green Jacket
headline.print_headline: Small Consolation for Spieth: He Still Has a Green Jacket

docs.snippet: Don't feel sorry for Jordan Spieth because he had to put the green jacket on Danny Willett right after throwing away the Masters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Don't feel sorry for Jordan Spieth because he had to put the green jacket on Danny Willett right after throwing away the Masters.
